title: computer crashes after loading the game
body: dude plz reply to me cuz I think I'm the only one, has this happened to u? u go into champion select, after every one chooses u start game, AS SOON AS U START THE GAME the whole computer crashes.  {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

replies.body: Can you provide some more specifics on what you mean by crash?  Are you receiving an error messages and the client is just crashing, or do you mean that your entire PC is shutting off?  I'd like to help out, but these could be very different factors depending on what's going on.  Let me know!

ok thank you for replying. so this is the problem, I go in a coustem game cuz I don't wanna get a lever buster, I choose my champ and I load the game. as soon as the game starts at 1 second in the game my whole computer freezes. only way I can leave is by holding down the power button. My brother has the same exact laptop and everything is running smoothly for him.

Thanks for the information!  Did you recently update your Windows 10?  I've seen some players having an issue like this after the anniversary update.  Your issue could be due to an Xbox Game bar feature that came along with it.  Use this [guide ](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html)to disable it, and let me know the results!
DUDE U FIXED IT, THAT WAS THE PROBLEM THE XBOX THING THANK U VERRRYRYRYRYRYRYRYY MUCHHHHH
it is in 640x480 resolution and I checked the settings from my computer settings everything is fine

It sounds like you still have a series of issues, so we'll take it one step at a time.  It sounds like your drivers may be out of date!  Some of your game files could also be corrupt.  Go through each step in our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide, which will help resolve and tune-up your PC.  Thanks for all the troubleshooting!
nothing worked, do u think I should uninstall and reinstall?

Download the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to automatically gather logs for context, and attach it to your ticket.  We'll respond asap!
